title: Cultural Exploration and Language Learning Through Festivals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and general understanding of multicultural education
context.additional_context: Blended learning environments integrating online-offline modalities through digital device utilization, emphasizing team-based activities

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze the cultural significance of festivals by applying African-centered pedagogy
Learners can collaborate with team members to execute festival planning projects through participatory action research
Learners can use arts-based activities to verbally express and present their cultural identity exploration process
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
